Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11792701]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=0.08-0.16 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=0.16-0.31 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC=0.63-1.25 µM), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC=1.25-2.50 µM).
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity. Has insecticidal activity. Probably acts by disturbing membrane Function

Literature.Title: Cupiennin 1, a new family of highly basic antimicrobial peptides in the venom of the spider Cupiennius salei (Ctenidae).
Literature.Author: Kuhn-Nentwig L, Muller J, Schaller J, Walz A, Dathe M, Nentwig W.

Literature.Title: Characterisation of antibacterial activity of peptides isolated from the venom of the spider Cupiennius salei (Araneae Ctenidae).
Literature.Author: Haeberli S, Kuhn-Nentwig L, Schaller J, Nentwig W.
